title: Installation issue: gnutls with intel

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gnutls %intel@19.0.3
...
==> Building gnutls [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j24'

13 errors found in build log:
     20925                     from /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.h(28),
     20926                     from /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(28):
     20927    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/fips.h(53): warning #188: enumerated type mixed with another type
     20928              return _gnutls_lib_mode;
     20929                     ^
     20930
  >> 20931    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(36): error: a value of type "int" cannot be used to initialize an entity of type "atomic_uint
              "
     20932      static atomic_uint rnd_initialized = 0;
     20933                                           ^
     20934
  >> 20935    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(40): error: expression must have arithmetic or pointer type
     20936              if (unlikely(!rnd_initialized)) {
     20937                  ^
     20938
  >> 20939    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(42): error: a value of type "int" cannot be assigned to an entity of type "atomic_uint"
     20940                              rnd_initialized = 1;
     20941                                              ^
     20942
  >> 20943    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(47): error: expression must have arithmetic or pointer type
     20944                      if (!rnd_initialized) {
     20945                           ^
     20946
  >> 20947    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(53): error: a value of type "int" cannot be assigned to an entity of type "atomic_uint"
     20948                              rnd_initialized = 1;
     20949                                              ^
     20950
  >> 20951    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(110): error: expression must have arithmetic or pointer type
     20952              if (rnd_initialized && _gnutls_rnd_ops.deinit != NULL) {
     20953                  ^
     20954
  >> 20955    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(113): error: a value of type "int" cannot be assigned to an entity of type "atomic_uint"
     20956              rnd_initialized = 0;
     20957                              ^
     20958
  >> 20959    /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c(165): error: expression must have arithmetic or pointer type
     20960              if (rnd_initialized && _gnutls_rnd_ops.rnd_refresh)
     20961                  ^
     20962
     20963    compilation aborted for /lustre/home/acct-hpc/hpc-jianwen/spack/var/spack/stage/gnutls-3.5.19-laicve7s72saj3y6rhglb4xrnkowtola/gnutls-3.5.19/lib/random.c (code 2)
  >> 20964    make[4]: *** [random.lo] Error 1
     20965    make[4]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     20966    icc: command line warning #10148: option '-Waggressive-loop-optimizations' not supported
     20967    icc: command line warning #10148: option '-Wbad-function-cast' not supported
     20968    icc: command line warning #10148: option '-Wbool-compare' not supported
     20969    icc: command line warning #10148: option '-Wcast-align' not supported
     20970    icc: command line warning #10148: option '-Wchkp' not supported
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux  3.10.0-862.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Apr 20 16:44:24 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
```
